[Intro]
[ch]Em[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]  x2

[Verse 1]
[ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]

           [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]
Drawing me in, and you kicking me out
          [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]          [ch]Em[/ch]

             [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]

                [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on your magical mystery ride
        [ch]Cadd9[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]         [ch]Amadd9[/ch]
And I'm so   dizzy, don't know what hit me, but I'll be alright

[Pre-Chorus A]
   [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
My head's under water
    [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Amadd9[/ch]
But I'm breathing fine
                 [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]
You're crazy and I'm out of my mind

[Chorus]
       [ch]G[/ch]
Cause all of me
       [ch]Emadd9[/ch]
Loves all of you
          [ch]Am/C[/ch]
Love your curves and all your edges
           [ch]C/D[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]
All your perfect imperfections
           [ch]G[/ch]
Give your all to me
             [ch]Emadd9[/ch]
I'll give my all to you
          [ch]Am/C[/ch]
You're my end and my beginning
     [ch]C/D[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]
Even when I lose I'm winning
                  [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]Dadd9[/ch]
Cause I give you all, all of me
                 [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Dadd9[/ch]
And you give me all, all of you, oh

[Verse 2]
[ch]Em[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]
How many times do I have to tell you
                 [ch]D[/ch]                       [ch]Em[/ch]
Even when you're crying you’re beautiful too
              [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]Em[/ch]
The world is beating you down, I'm around through every mood
             [ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]G[/ch]
You're my downfall, you're my muse
             [ch]D[/ch]                        [ch]Em[/ch]
My worst distraction, my rhythm and blues
                [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]Am[/ch]
I can't stop singing, it's ringing, in my head for you

[Pre-Chorus A]
   [ch]Am[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]
My head's under water
    [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Amadd9[/ch]
But I'm breathing fine

           [ch]G[/ch]
Give your all to me
             [ch]Emadd9[/ch]
I'll give my all to you
          [ch]Am/C[/ch]
You're my end and my beginning
     [ch]C/D[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]
Even when I lose I'm winning
                  [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]Dadd9[/ch]
Cause I give you all, all of me
                 [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]Dadd9[/ch]
And you give me all, all of you, oh

[Pre-Chorus B]
[ch]Am[/ch]         [ch]G[/ch]
Cards on the table
       [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]Amadd9[/ch]
We're both showing hearts
[ch]Am[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
Risking it all, though it's hard

[Chorus]

Cause all of me

Cause I give you all, all of me

content.text:
Song: All of me
Artist: John Legend
Composers: John Stephens and Toby Gad
Album: Love in the future

Tabbed by DJ ('DiddyD' on ultimateGuitar.com)
11th Sept 2018

Promo video at this link:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=450p7goxZqg

CAPO: 1st fret (Will then sound in the recorded key of Fm)

N.B.
Please IGNORE ANY POP-UP CHORD BOXES the website might
automatically suggest and use the typed shapes shown below:

[ch]Em[/ch] = 022000   [ch]Cmaj7[/ch] = x32000   [ch]Em9[/ch]   = 020032  * [ch]Em[/ch]     = 022003
[ch]C[/ch]  = x32010   [ch]Csus2[/ch] = x30033   [ch]C6[/ch]    = x32210    [ch]Emadd9[/ch] = 022002
[ch]G[/ch]  = 320003   [ch]Am9[/ch]   = x05500   [ch]C/D[/ch]   = xx0010    [ch]Cadd9[/ch]  = x32030
[ch]D[/ch]  = xx0232   [ch]Am[/ch]    = x02210   [ch]Dsus2[/ch] = xx0230    [ch]Gadd9[/ch]  = 3x0203
                                               * [ch]C[/ch]      = x32013
N.C. = No chords
^    = Emphasise the beats

Please select a star rating for this tab, many thanks

================================================================

[Intro]
     [ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D[/ch]
||:  /  /  /  / | /  /  /  / | /  /  /  / | /  /  /  /  :|| [x2]
     ^     ^  ^   ^     ^  ^   ^     ^  ^   ^     ^  ^

[Verse 1]
[ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]
    What would I do without your smart mouth?
           [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]
Drawing me in, and you kicking me out,
               [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]Em[/ch]
You've got my head spinning, no kidding, I can't pin you down,
            [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]                  [ch]G[/ch]
What's going on in that beautiful mind?
              [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm on your magical mystery ride,
       [ch]Csus2[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]Am9[/ch]
And I'm so dizzy, don't know what hit me, but I'll be al - right

[Pre-Chorus]
   [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]Am9[/ch]
My head's under - water, but I'm breathing fine,
   [ch]Am[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
You're crazy, and I'm ...out of my mind

[Chorus]
        [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]Em9[/ch]
'Cause all of me loves all of you,
           [ch]C6[/ch]                 [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]
Love your curves and all your edges,
           [ch]C/D[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]
All your perfect imper - fections,
           [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]Em9[/ch]
Give your all to me, I'll give my all to you,
          [ch]C6[/ch]              [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]         [ch]C/D[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]
You're my end and my be - ginning, even when I lose I'm winning,
                 * [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Emadd9[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]Cadd9[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]Gadd9[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]Dsus2[/ch]
'Cause I give you all----------------- of me,
                 * [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Emadd9[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]Cadd9[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]   [ch]Gadd9[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]Dsus2[/ch]
  And you give me all----------------- of you,          oh - oh!

[Verse 2]
[ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]Cmaj7[/ch]                    [ch]G[/ch]
    How many times do I have to tell you,
                  [ch]D[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]
Even when you're crying you’re beautiful too,
   [ch]Emadd9[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]   [ch]Cadd9[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
The world is beat - ing you down,
          [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]Dsus2[/ch]  [ch]Em[/ch]
I'm a - round through every mood,
[ch]Emadd9[/ch]       [ch]C[/ch]      [ch]Cadd9[/ch]      [ch]G[/ch]
You're my downfall, you're my muse,
                  [ch]D[/ch]         [ch]Dsus2[/ch]      [ch]Emadd9[/ch]

content.text:
--------------------------------------------------

So here's my version of Passengers' 'Let Her Go'

It's played with standard tuning and without Capo.

--------------------------------------------------


[Intro]

[ch]C[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] 2x


[Hook]

                       [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]
Well you only need the light when it's burning low 
              [ch]D[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]
Only miss the sun when it starts to snow 
              [ch]C[/ch]                         [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]
Only know you love her when you let her go 
                      [ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]G[/ch]
Only know you've been high when you're feeling low 
              [ch]D[/ch]                        [ch]Em[/ch]
Only hate the road when you're missing home 
              [ch]C[/ch]                         [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]    
Only know you love her when you let her go 

And you let her go 


[ch]Em[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]D[/ch] [ch]Bm[/ch] [ch]Em[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]D[/ch]


[Verse]

[ch]Em[/ch]                            [ch]C[/ch]                               
Staring at the bottom of your glass 
       [ch]D[/ch]                           [ch]Bm[/ch]                            
Hoping one day you'll make a dream last 
                [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]                            
But dreams come slow and they go so fast 
    [ch]Em[/ch]                          [ch]C[/ch]                             
You see her when you close your eyes 
      [ch]D[/ch]                         [ch]Bm[/ch]                            
Maybe one day you'll understand why 
               [ch]Em[/ch]                [ch]C[/ch]   [ch]D[/ch]                   
Everything you touch, oh it dies 


[Hook]

                      [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]              
But you only need the light when it's burning low 
              [ch]D[/ch]                     [ch]Em[/ch]                    
Only miss the sun when it starts to snow 
              [ch]C[/ch]                         [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]                    
Only know you love her when you let her go 
                      [ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]G[/ch]             
Only know you've been high when you're feeling low 
              [ch]D[/ch]                        [ch]Em[/ch]                     
Only hate the road when you're missing home 
              [ch]C[/ch]                         [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]                    
Only know you love her when you let her go 


[Verse]

[ch]Em[/ch]                            [ch]C[/ch]                                                                 
Staring at the ceiling in the dark 
         [ch]D[/ch]                     [ch]Bm[/ch]                             
Same old empty feeling in your heart 
                  [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]C[/ch]          [ch]D[/ch]                   
'Cause love comes slow and it goes so fast 
         [ch]Em[/ch]                     [ch]C[/ch]                             
Well you see her when you fall asleep 
             [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]Bm[/ch]                            
But never to touch and never to keep 
                         [ch]Em[/ch]                 [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]         
'Cause you loved her too much and you dive too deep 


[Hook]

                       [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]
Well you only need the light when it's burning low

NOTE: These are not the same chords a single guitarist will be playing.  This was
all done using the harmonics of each chord.  So if someone tells you, “You’re
playing it wrong,” tell them to play along and it will match.  I promise.
That should just about do it.  If you’re a rhythm player and you don’t wanna be
left out when the band starts playing this song, then this is for you.  I didn’t
tab the solos because I play lead guitar and I wouldn’t want anybody just copying
my solos.  It’s not fair to take those from Jimmy Page.  They’re a part of him
and he’s a part of them.  So I’ll leave that to the imagination (after all, it’s
always improvised anyway).
Questions, comments, prayer requests, snide remarks? (ha, ha) E-mail me at midwine73@yahoo.com

content.text:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
          Stairway to Heaven – Led Zeppelin
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Written by: Page/Plant
From: "Led Zeppelin IV" (1971)

Tabbed by: maguri
Tuning: Standard

Some of the versions here are easy to play, but do not sound right at all.
Others have the correct chords, but are probably too difficult for many 
players who are familiar with some basic shapes but are not yet used to 
go beyond the first three frets and may have problems playing barre 
chords. With this version I tried to go a middle way.

I kept the chords easy to play, but they should still fit the 
original. Some may have intimidating names but don't let that discourage 
you: if you look at the voicings, you'll notice they are not difficult 
because I cut them down so they can mostly be played using only two or 
three fingers of the left hand and there are no barree chords at all.

Comments are highly welcome, enjoy!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
CHORDS

[Verses]               [Verse 6]
        E-A-D-G-B-e            E-A-D-G-B-e
Am      x-0-2-2-1-0     F      x-3-3-2-1-x
Eaug    x-x-2-1-1-0     Fmaj7  x-3-3-2-1-0
C/E     x-x-2-0-1-0
Fmaj7   x-x-3-2-1-0

[Bridge]
Am7     x-0-2-2-1-3
Em/D    x-x-0-4-5-3  = Dm voicing, but two frets higher
C/D     x-x-0-0-1-0
G/B     x-2-0-0-0-3

[Interlude]
Dsus2   x-x-0-2-3-0
D       x-x-0-2-3-2
Dsus4   x-x-0-2-3-3
C       x-x-2-0-1-0  = left out the root note, so one still has a
Cadd+11 x-x-2-0-1-2      finger left for the following Cadd+11 
G/B     x-2-0-0-0-2

[Solo]
G6      3-2-0-0-0-0
Fmaj7   x(3)3-2-1-0

 I wake you up with some breakfast in bed

  [ch]G[/ch]                    [ch]Dsus4/F#[/ch]
 Just say you won't let go

 Just say you won't let go

[Verse 3]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
                    Let it Be – The Beatles
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Written by: Lennon/McCartney
From: "Let it Be" (1970)

Tabbed by: maguri
Tuning: Standard

My reading here includes the notes that organ, brass and harmonies add to 
the regular chords (especially in the chorus) and a variation in the last 
verse (an extra Dm/A).

I also added tabs for verse, chorus and the two bar link which features 
a Bb (the minor 7th of the C chord) in the bass that is also missing 
from the other versions but which adds to the gospel feel of the song.

content.text:
[Verse 1]
         [ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]Em[/ch]
Now I've heard there was a secret chord
     [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]Em[/ch]

    [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]                
But you don't really care for music, do you?
   [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]
It goes like this the fourth, the fifth
    [ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]C[/ch]      
The minor fall, the major lift
    [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]B7[/ch]          [ch]Em[/ch]
The baffled king composing Hallelujah
     [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]Em[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]
Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelu-u-jah

[Verse 2]
     [ch]G[/ch]                         [ch]Em[/ch]
Your faith was strong, but you needed proof
    [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]Em[/ch]
You saw her bathing on the roof
    [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]
Her beauty and the moonlight overthrew ya
    [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
She tied you to a kitchen chair
    [ch]Em[/ch]                         [ch]C[/ch]            
She broke your throne, and she cut your hair
    [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]B7[/ch]            [ch]Em[/ch]
And from your lips she drew the Hallelujah
     [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]Em[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]
Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelu-u-jah

I don't even know the name

But if I did, well really, what's it to ya?

HALLELUJAH
Leonard Cohen


[Verse 1]

    [ch]Am[/ch]                 [ch]F[/ch]
the minor fall and the major lift
    [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]E[/ch]          [ch]Am[/ch]
The baffled king composing hallelujah

    [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]F[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]

    [ch]Am[/ch]                         [ch]F[/ch]

And from your lips she drew the Hallelujah

Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah


[Verse 3]

[Verse 4]

       [ch]C[/ch]        [ch]C/B[/ch]   [ch]Am[/ch]

Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah

With nothing on my tongue but Hallelujah
